mapper.delete: DELETE FROM example WHERE question_no = #{questionNo} AND example_no = #{exampleNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO example (question_no, example_idx, example_title , answer_ox) VALUES (#{questionNo}, #{exampleIdx}, #{exampleTitle}, #{answerOx})
mapper.select: SELECT q.question_no qNO , e.example_no eNO , e.example_idx eIdx , e.example_title eTitle , e.answer_ox eOX FROM question q INNER JOIN example e ON q.question_no= e.question_no WHERE q.question_no=#{questionNo} AND q.test_no=#{testNo}
